comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Johann Hans von Zwehl (27.7.1851 - 28.5.1926) place of birth: Osterode (Ostroda - East Prussia) Prussian general of infantry who came out of retirement to command the VII. Reserves under Buelow's Second Army. He served as Germany's military governor to Antwerp, Belgium during the latter half of the war. After the War, he worked as General von Falkenhayn's authorized biographer. He was married to the former Helene Lambert. 02.08.1914 VII. Reservekorps = 2. Armee 17.12.1916 General-Gouverneur - Antwerp home.comcast.net/~jcviser/akb/zwehl.htm

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for pointing us to this additional information. We'll be sure to include it when we update.
